document.masterDocTitle: The Snail-killing Flies (Diptera: Sciomyzidae) of West Africa

Verbeke 1961 : 44

Verbeke 1963 : 59

(Cape Verde Is.). Synonymy by
Verbeke 1963 : 59

Biology.
Knutson et al . 1967
; Gbedjissi 1997 ;
Gbedjissi et al . 2003
; Gbedjissi & Vala 2014 . Primarily predators of freshwater snails, opportunistic predators of freshwater oligochaetes.
